name: Little-book-of-linux
tagline: A cheat sheet to linux. Things I've learnt along the way.
body:
# My little book of all things Linux

A quite simple reference to everything I've learnt about linux. I'm not a systems administer. I'm a web-ops focussed web developer.

If you're not overly familiar with Linux, this might be a good resource for you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
